Class QuizManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Management.QuizManagementController

  • @SessionAttributes(value="scenarioId")
 @Controller
public class QuizManagementController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getQuizManagementController

        @RequestMapping(value="/quiz-management",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String getQuizManagementController(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="selectedScenario",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer scenarioId)
        Returns the page for managing a Quiz.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        scenarioId - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        "quiz-management" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • submitQuestions

        @RequestMapping(value="/submit-questions",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String submitQuestions(@RequestParam(value="question1")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String question1,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="question2")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String question2,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="question3")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String question3,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(name="question4",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String question4,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(name="question5",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String question5,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer scenarioId)
        Implements the creation of a new Quiz for the specified Scenario.
        Parameters:
        question1 - String, 1st Question for the new Quiz.
        question2 - String, 2nd Question for the new Quiz.
        question3 - String, 3rd Question for the new Quiz.
        question4 - String, 4th Question for the new Quiz.
        question5 - String, 5th Question for the new Quiz.
        scenarioId - Integer indicating the identifier of the Scenario to create the new Quiz for.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/scenario-panel" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
